name: Witch's Domain
description:
Playing on WebGL will take a while to load due to its unreasonably large build therefore isn't recommended

------------------------------------------

Control: WASD

Help Scared Skeleton: Hold down E near it for 3 secs

---------------------------------------

Objective: find a hole in the wall and escape safely!

---------------------------------------

Additional infos

Ccurrently   there are a total of 5 stages in the game (2 tutorial levels included.)

Scared skeleton: if you were to decide to help him escape you will gain a random boost that you can actually stack up eventually and help yourself escape in return he will be following you around and if he got caught so will you.

Zombie chef:  when player is in sight it will constantly chase you, and when near enough you will die.

Ash witch: higher speed, larger sight area, larger patrol areas than zombie chef

--------------------------------------

Boosts

Speedy chef: Double player speed for 5 seconds

Small guy: turns you 2x smaller for 1 run

Sacrificial pawn: lets you revive and became immortal for 3 seconds

-------------------------------------------

Credits:

- all sfx are taken from freesound.org

- all 3d models and codes are written by me during Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 (Didn't made it to the submission time tho)

--------------------------------------------

Q&A:

Why are the zombie chef, a chef?

- because the dev's original plan was to create a restaurant escape game. but somehow it went down this path.

Why can the enemies goes through objects?

- forgive the dev. its a bug and the dev is dying, so...

No pause, and no volume controller?

- yeah no 

Whats with the terrible animation?

- Look.  if it works it works

Whats with the weird naming?

- u-uhm...
